title: Stoke battle back to hold Huddersfield
shortDescription: Championship promotion hopefuls Huddersfield and Stoke cancelled each other out as they drew 1-1 on Friday night.

title: West Ham among clubs interested in Leeds' Raphinha
shortDescription: A number of clubs, including West Ham, are interested in Leeds winger Raphinha.

title: Derby County's debts believed to be over £60m
shortDescription: Derby County's debts are believed to be more than a staggering £60m, Sky Sports News has been told.

title: Women's FA Cup prize money to increase next season
shortDescription: The FA has announced a "significant increase" in Women's FA Cup prize money after criticism of the disparity between current figures and those for the men's competition.

title: Juventus confirm £66.6m Vlahovic signing
shortDescription: Juventus have completed the signing of striker Dusan Vlahovic from Fiorentina for £66.6m, with the Serbia international joining Juve on a four-and-a-half-year deal.

title: Atletico interest in Villa defender Cash intensifies
shortDescription: Atletico Madrid have made contact with the representatives of Aston Villa defender Matty Cash as their interest in the defender intensifies.

title: Traore having Barca medical | Wolves forward unconvinced by Spurs
shortDescription: Adama Troare was undergoing a medical in Barcelona on Friday evening ahead of his move from Wolves.

title: Spurs rival Villa for Bentancur as Villa have £20.5m bid rejected
shortDescription: Tottenham are rivalling Aston Villa for Juventus midfielder Rodrigo Bentancur after Villa had a £20.5m bid rejected for the Uruguayan, according to Sky in Italy.

title: Rooney 'turned down' Everton approach | Decision soon
shortDescription: Wayne Rooney has revealed he turned down an approach to hold talks with Everton about their vacant manager's job.

title: Spurs in talks to sign Juve winger Kulusevski on loan
shortDescription: Tottenham are in talks to sign winger Dejan Kulusevski from Juventus on loan.
